mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_INDEX memberIndex, TEAM_INDEX index, TEAM_NAME name, TEAM_EMBLEM emblem, TEAM_CAPTAIN captain, TEAM_SPORT sport, TEAM_SORT sort, TEAM_ADDR address, TEAM_INFO info, TEAM_AGE avgage, TEAM_STYLE style FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_NAME LIKE #{name}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TEAM ( TEAM_NAME, TEAM_EMBLEM, TEAM_CAPTAIN, TEAM_SPORT, TEAM_SORT, TEAM_ADDR, TEAM_INFO, TEAM_AGE, TEAM_STYLE ) VALUES ( #{name}, #{emblem}, #{captain}, #{sport}, #{sort}, #{address}, #{info}, #{avgage}, #{style} )
